product_name: Lole Dukha Wrap Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The fashion-forward, long-sleeve Lole Dukha Wrap top for women is a real yoga contortionist, keeping you comfortable on the mat with a moisture-wicking, stretchy fabric blended with organic cotton. Very soft fabric resists odors, and Tencel(R) lyocell content of the fabric is made from quick-growing, low-impact Eucalyptus tree farms. Lole Dukha Wrap top for women features reflective logos.
short_description: The fashion-forward, long-sleeve Lole Dukha Wrap top for women is a real yoga contortionist, keeping you comfortable on the mat with a moisture-wicking, stretchy fabric blended with organic cotton.
